name: Split Decisions
description:
Made by both Cheetahgamer247 and Bume Bume. A game made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam where you control both the player and the enemies with WASD or Arrow Keys.  
There was an evil wizard named Split who cursed this promised hero. Inas was this hero’s name. Split cursed him and tore him into two. The only way to stop Split is to find Inas's other side in Split's dungeon and make Inas whole again.
